description_en: Daily-frequency ridership data for various public transport services across the country.
description_ms: Data penggunaan pengangkutan awam berfrekuensi harian daripada beberapa perkhidmatan pengangkutan awam di seluruh negara.
methodology_en: This dataset is derived from anonymous transactional data generated by the ticketing or tap-in/out systems of the various public transport services across the country.
methodology_ms: Set data ini dihasilkan daripada data transaksi yang dijana oleh sistem tiket atau sistem tap masuk/keluar yang digunakan oleh pelbagai perkhidmatan pengangkutan awam di seluruh negara.
caveat_en:
These ridership numbers represent 'headline' totals for major public transport services. There are several nuances to bear in mind:
 1. For Prasarana-operated services (LRT, MRT, Monorail), you should not attempt to derive the values in this dataset from origin-destination data, because the methodology for attributing ridership to specific lines (especially at interchange stations) is not straightforward.
 2. For KTMB-operated services (Komuter, Intercity, ETS, Shuttle Tebrau), the headline totals are directly derived from origin-destination data as the various services do not 'cross' in their operations.
 3. Although origin-destination data is updated daily on our site, this dataset is updated monthly because the headline numbers go through an audit process prior to publication.
caveat_ms:
Angka ini mewakiili jumlah penumpang keseluruhan bagi perkhidmatan pengangkutan awam utama. Terdapat beberapa nuansa yang perlu diberi perhatian:
 1. Bagi perkhidmatan yang dikendalikan oleh Prasarana (LRT, MRT dan Monorel), angka keseluruhan tidak boleh dihasilkan terus daripada data asal-destinasi ('origin-destination') kerana metodologi untuk mengira penumpang bagi laluan tertentu (khususnya di stesen pertukaran) adalah agak kompleks.
 2. Bagi perkhidmatan yang dikendalikan oleh KTMB (Komuter, Antarabandar, ETS dan Shuttle Tebrau), angka keseluruhan dihasilkan daripada data stesen asal ke stesen destinasi kerana perkhidmatan tersebut ini tidak bersilang semasa operasi.
 3. Walaupun data asal-destinasi dikemaskini setiap hari di portal ini, set data ini dikemaskini secara bulanan kerana melalui proses audit sebelum penerbitan.
publication_en: Ridership numbers for Prasarana-operated services are also published as part of their [MyRapid Performance Update](https://myrapid.com.my/myrapid-performance/); the data here is 100% consistent with the data published there as it is derived from the same source. Our site also features a [dashboard on public transport ridership](https://data.gov.my/dashboard/public-transportation)!
publication_ms: Data penggunaan pengangkutan awam berfrekuensi harian daripada beberapa perkhidmatan pengangkutan awam di seluruh negara.
